Title: (EN) Yri the Avali
Author: Yridyl
Description:
Play as a Fluffy Space Raptor!

Adds an evasion, stance-dance, combo based DPS/Tank character.

Includes 10 Skills, 2 Rare Skills, 1 Lucy Draw Skill, and 2 Upgrades.

Images are from a mix of edited stock images, Toddâ€™s Avali Lore Book, TERA Online, and my messy digital art skills. 

Huge thanks to LULZDOSH for helping with skill concepts and balancing.


Report any bugs, balancing issues, or suggestions to me via Workshop comments or Discord.
Discord: yridyl
